problem.markdown:
1. End point of rotating link of elliptical trammel travels in a straight line
(x) True () False
2. Which point of the rotating link in elliptical trammel traces a circular path?
(x) mid point () both mid point and end point () neither mid point nor end point () end point
3. A point on the line obtained by extending the rotating link of elliptical trammel also traces an ellipse
(x) True () False
4. The length of rotating link in elliptical trammel is equal to ?
(x) half of sum of major axis and minor axis () double of sum of major axis and minor axis () sum of major axis and minor axis () None of these
5. Ellipse traced by an elliptical trammel has major axis 180mm and minor axis 100mm, what is the diameter of the circle that can be drawn without changing the link lengths of the mechanism
() 80 () 70 (x) 140 () none of these
problem.p: 1. End point of rotating link of elliptical trammel travels in a straight line
2. Which point of the rotating link in elliptical trammel traces a circular path?

choicegroup.choice: both mid point and end point
neither mid point nor end point

problem.p: 3. A point on the line obtained by extending the rotating link of elliptical trammel also traces an ellipse
4. The length of rotating link in elliptical trammel is equal to ?

choicegroup.choice: half of sum of major axis and minor axis
double of sum of major axis and minor axis
sum of major axis and minor axis

problem.p: 5. Ellipse traced by an elliptical trammel has major axis 180mm and minor axis 100mm, what is the diameter of the circle that can be drawn without changing the link lengths of the mechanism
